remarks: Elimination of an existential quantifier, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Oct-2016.)
statement:
ceqsex.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
ceqsex.2 $e |- A e. _V $.
ceqsex.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsex $p |- ( E. x ( x = A /\ ph ) <-> ps ) $.
$d A x $.
